fields.description:
Hi ,

Create Sample App in Titanium with Webview. Pass this https://razorpay.com/demo/ as url to WebView

Step to follow
1. Click Pay via Razor Pay
2. Enter your Mobile and Email and Click proceed
3.Select Netbanking option
4.Choose HDFC for android or Any bank for iOS
5.Click Pay
6. You can seen black window

In android After Selecting HDFC bank, you will see only blank window is showing
For iOS any bank selection and clicking Pay button, only blank window is showing

 same link working properly on mobile external chrome and safari browser. but not working for mobile app browser

Please fix this for App webview.
fields.summary: Webview giving issue with net-banking code
